## Visualizations

### Libraries

```{r}
if (!require("renv")) install.packages("renv")
library(renv)
renv::restore()
library(here)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(arrow)
library(rgdal)
```

### Data Reading

```{r}
# gdf = read_csv('../data/raw/ne_10m_admin_1_states_provinces/ne_10m_admin_1_states_provinces.shp')

countries <- readOGR(dsn = "../data/raw/ne_10m_admin_1_states_provinces",
                     layer = "ne_10m_admin_1_states_provinces")

```

### Data filtering

```{r}
mexico <- countries[countries$iso_a2 == "MX", ]
head(mexico)
```

### Plotting

```{r}
plot(mexico)
```

```{r}
ggplot() +
      geom_polygon(data = mexico, aes(x = longitude,
                       y = latitude,
                       group = group),
                   colour = "black") +
      theme_void()

# mexico_map <- ggplot() +

```
